CustomField.description: Calculate the next wedding anniversary. 29 February is always replaced by 28. This field is referenced in TECH_UpcomingAnniversaryDate__c (used in the ios app to get birthday clients)
CustomField.formula: DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) + IF( OR( MONTH(Anniversary__c ) < MONTH (TODAY() ) , AND( MONTH(Anniversary__c ) = MONTH (TODAY() ) , DAY(Anniversary__c ) < DAY (TODAY() ) ) ) , 1 , 0 )) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__c ) ) & "-" & TEXT( IF( MONTH( Anniversary__c ) = 2 && DAY( Anniversary__c ) = 29 ,28, DAY( Anniversary__c )) ) )
CustomField.label: TECH Upcoming Wedding Date
